page.title: 16RELIGION IN HOLMER GREEN
page.content: There are 3 Churches in the village: Christchurch (Anglican)which was built in 1894 and is within the Parish of Penn Street.Rev.Nigel Stowe is the Vicar and Minister in charge is Captain Wilson of the Church Army.The Baptist Church was built in 1869 and the minister is Rev.H.Feast.The Methodist Church was built in 1937 and the Minister is the Rev.A.Shanahan.All 3 churches hold 2 services each Sunday and the average Sunday morning attendance is 90-100 per church.Each has additional accomodation for a variety of church and community activities e.g.prayer\study meetings, play groups,badminton.Each minister believes his primary role is caring for his congregation and preaching the Gospel.Congregations are increasingly involved in running their churches and serving the community.
